description.h2: There must be no directed cycles in effective relationships having arc role http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/summation-item.
description.p: This rule prevents a fact from participating in a summation that includes itself.

REMARK: This only applies to company extension linkbases. If a standard taxonomy linkbase appearing in edgartaxonomies.xml violated this rule it would be included in a 'good' test variation. In particular, add this test: calculation arcs form a directed cycle, but one of the imported standard arcs is prohibited, GOOD.

variation.name: 6.14.4, calculation relationships form an undirected cycle, which is allowed. GOOD.
variation.description: calculation relationships form an undirected cycle, which is allowed. GOOD.

variation.name: 6.14.4, calculation relationships form a directed cycle. NOGOOD.
variation.description: calculation relationships form a directed cycle. NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.14.4, calculation arcs form a directed cycle, but effective relationships do not. GOOD.
variation.description: calculation arcs form a directed cycle, but effective relationships do not. GOOD.
